data: PAL Palliative Care Bowel Protocol - Rectal Measures (Module)
Please refer to guideline in reference text
For assessment if goal has not been met for 3 days
Consider if minimal / no oral intake
Deselect all rectal measures below if neutropenic or thrombocytopenic
1 suppository, rectal, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: supp
10 mg, rectal, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: supp
5 mL, rectal, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: enema
130 mL, rectal, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: enema
Bowel Protocol Rectal Measures Step 5, PRN constipation
10 mL, topical, as directed, PRN constipation, drug form: jelly
